title: Fed Is in Right Place Now to Respond to News: Vincent Reinhart
description: BNY Investments Chief Economist Vincent Reinhart reacts to the long-awaited government data showing underlying US inflation cooled to a four-year low in November and the implications for Federal Reserve monetary policy on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: BNY Investments Chief Economist Vincent Reinhart reacts to the long-awaited government data showing underlying US inflation cooled to a four-year low in November and the implications for Federal Reserve monetary policy on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
